name: BEST LOW COST AIRLINE IN AMERICA? Southwest Airlines Review
description:
I took a couple of flights on the biggest airline in the USA, Southwest Airlines, to find out if they really are the best low cost airline in America!

What do you think to Southwest? Leave your thoughts in the comments below!
